subscriber_list.description: List of subscribers not having SubTopics in env

publisher_list.description: Common list wherein key refers to publisher and value is the CSL endpoint of that publisher which needs to be added to other subscribers

csl_pub_endpoint_list.description: Dict to store csl publishers json, any key present in publisher_list should be added here

increment_rtsp_port.description: Set this to true to increment rtsp port numbers in VideoIngestion config
